title: 'GM Street' — Unwrapping Some Week 13 Woes (Ep. 197)
description:
The Ringer's Michael Lombardi and Tate Frazier sit down to analyze the violent battle between the Steelers and Bengals (02:00), the vacancies in the Giants' front office (07:15), Tom Brady's sideline spat with Josh McDaniels (12:00), the trouble in Chicago (17:45), a new gig for Herm Edwards (29:00), and the College Football Playoff (34:30).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
